actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution proposing "The Better Part of Valor Amendment" to the Constitution of the United States for the purpose of providing common sense for the Presidency.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Proposes that no person shall be President of the United States who shall not have enough sense to come in out of the rain of bullets.

titles.title: Joint resolution proposing "The Better Part of Valor Amendment" to the Constitution of the United States for the purpose of providing common sense for the Presidency.
